results.title: Simvastatin Restores HDAC1/2 Activity and Improves Behavioral Deficits in Angelman Syndrome Model Mouse
results.text_hl: These results suggest that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ could be a promising drug for the treatment of @<m>DISEASE_Angelman_Syndrome</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D017204 @@@AS@@@.
